model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game

  • public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstraction of a game.
    Author:
    Celia Cacciatore - Raphael Bauduin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(java.util.Set<Player> players)
      Initializes the game.

      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the player whose turn it is.

      Returns a set of all the players in the game.

      Returns the players who won the game.
      abstract void initializeStates()
      Initializes the two states with the two players.
      abstract boolean isFinished()
      Tests if the game is finished or not.

      Plays a move in the game.

      Sets the new state.

        Player player)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Plays a move in the game.
        Parameters:
        move - the move to play in the game
        player - the player whose turn it is
